title: Create insurance broker homepage for Jonathan Ayan

requirements.text: Create a professional homepage that introduces Jonathan Ayan as a life and annuity insurance broker based in Miami, Florida

quotes: my name is Jonathan Ayan I am living in Miami Florida

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays Jonathan Ayan's name prominently

requirements.text: Display a section showcasing the A-rated insurance companies Jonathan represents, including Mutual of Omaha, FNG, Transamerica, Ethos, and Forrester

quotes: I have access to all the A rated companies in the country as in Mutual of Omaha FNG annuities in life, Transamerica ethos Forrester, and a few others

acceptanceCriteria: Section lists at least: Mutual of Omaha, FNG, Transamerica, Ethos, Forrester
Companies are presented in a clean, organized format

requirements.text: Create a services section explaining life insurance and annuities offerings with clear descriptions of what assistance is available

quotes: can offer any assistance with life insurance or annuities

requirements.text: Include contact information section for potential clients to reach Jonathan Ayan

Design the homepage with a professional, trustworthy visual theme using warm, sophisticated colors (such as navy blue, gold accents, and crisp whites), clean typography, and a layout that conveys stability and expertise appropriate for financial services
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme uses professional, trust-building colors
Design is consistent across all homepage sections

constraints: Keep the website simple and focused on a single homepage
Maintain professional tone appropriate for insurance services
nonGoals: Online quote calculators or insurance application forms
